Posts.Content: Hi. Just want to comment on the celebrex you mentioned. It is a questionable drug to say the least. Don't take it. -Kitty
Posts.Title: Aromasin and Arimidex

Posts.Content: Hi. I am taking femara for metastatic ca, and I have similar side effects, though no weight gain. It's very disturbing. Not sure what the resolve will be, but I am looking for alternatives. I will post any progress. -Kitty
Posts.Title: Femara For Breast Cancer Recurrence

Posts.Content: Hi. Perhaps you could search google with something about biopsy spreading cancer. I do not remember the details, but I had visited an alternative group where people felt strongly against biopsies. Gather your information first, and don't forget to say your prayers. Proceed when you feel good (enough) about it. As an extra measure, there is evidence that milk thistle is beneficial for the liver. -Kitty
Posts.Title: Stage iv Into Liver

Posts.Content: Hi. I have arthritis in one knee that is swollen. . . clearly from this femara. . but I sure hope it's not RA. I guess the fact that it's only in one,would say it's not RA. -Kitty
Posts.Title: Arimidex, Femera, Aromisin Causing Autoimmune Disease

Posts.Content: Hi. I am fighting metastatic bc and am currently very discouraged about the femara I am taking. If you read the various postings on it, most folks, me included, are plagued with a variety of discomforts. If I were cleared and had a low risk for recurrence, there is no way I would be putting up with this medicine. I would exercise and seek nutritional counsel and build up my immune system, and stay close to God. All the best to you, -Kitty
